mapper.select: SELECT MAX (A.RL_DIV) AS menuRlDiv FROM MENU_RL_MPPG A, (SELECT MENU_ID FROM MENU_MNG WHERE PGM_ID = (SELECT PGM_ID FROM PRM_MNG WHERE PGM_PARAM = #{pgmParam})) B WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND EXISTS (SELECT RL_ID FROM (SELECT RL_ID FROM RL_USER_MPPG WHERE U_SQ = #{usrId} UNION ALL SELECT RL_ID FROM RL_MNG WHERE RL_CD = 'authenticated') D WHERE A.RL_ID = D.RL_ID)

SELECT CASE WHEN B.MENU_LVL = 2 THEN B.MENU_ID WHEN B.MENU_LVL = 4 THEN A.UPR_MENU_ID ELSE A.MENU_ID END menuId1Lvl, CASE WHEN B.MENU_LVL = 2 THEN NULL WHEN B.MENU_LVL = 4 THEN A.MENU_ID ELSE B.MENU_ID END menuId2Lvl, CASE WHEN B.MENU_LVL = 4 THEN B.MENU_ID ELSE NULL END menuId3Lvl, B.MENU_LVL AS menuMiniLvl FROM MENU_MNG A, (SELECT C.MENU_LVL, C.UPR_MENU_ID, C.MENU_ID FROM MENU_MNG C, PRM_MNG D WHERE D.PGM_PARAM = #{pgmParam} AND C.PGM_ID = D.PGM_ID) B WHERE A.MENU_ID = B.UPR_MENU_ID

SELECT DISTINCT B.MENU_ID AS menuId, B.UPR_MENU_ID AS uprMenuId, B.MENU_NAME AS menuName, B.PGM_ID AS pgmId, C.PGM_URL AS pgmUrl, B.MENU_LUP AS menuLup, B.OT_URL AS otUrl, B.MENU_DIV AS menuDiv, B.USE_YN AS useYn, CASE WHEN C.PGM_URL IS NOT NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'B' END menuUrlGubun FROM MENU_RL_MPPG A, (SELECT * FROM MENU_MNG WHERE UPR_MENU_ID =
(SELECT UPR_MENU_ID FROM MENU_MNG WHERE MENU_ID = #{menuId1Lvl})
(SELECT MENU_ID FROM MENU_MNG WHERE MENU_DIV = (SELECT MENU_DIV FROM MENU_MNG WHERE PGM_ID = (SELECT PGM_ID FROM PRM_MNG WHERE PGM_PARAM = #{pgmParam})) AND UPR_MENU_ID IS NULL)
) B, PRM_MNG C WHERE EXISTS (SELECT RL_ID FROM (SELECT RL_ID FROM RL_USER_MPPG WHERE U_SQ = #{usrId} UNION ALL SELECT RL_ID FROM RL_MNG WHERE RL_CD = 'authenticated') D WHERE A.RL_ID = D.RL_ID) AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND B.PGM_ID = C.PGM_ID(+) ORDER BY B.MENU_LUP ASC

SELECT C.PGM_URL FROM ( SELECT A.MENU_DIV, A.PGM_ID, A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_LUP, A.UPR_MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME FROM (
AND E.MENU_DIV = '2' UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MENU_MNG WHERE MENU_DIV = '2' AND UPR_MENU_ID IS NULL) A START WITH A.UPR_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.UPR_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.MENU_LUP) B, PRM_MNG C WHERE B.UPR_MENU_ID IS NOT NULL AND C.PGM_URL IS NOT NULL AND C.PGM_ID = B.PGM_ID AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT C.MENU_ID AS menuId, C.UPR_MENU_ID AS uprMenuId, C.MENU_NAME AS menuName, C.PGM_ID AS pgmId, C.PGM_URL AS pgmUrl, C.MENU_LUP AS menuLup, C.OT_URL AS otUrl, C.MENU_DIV AS menuDiv, C.USE_YN AS useYn, LEVEL, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS isleaf, CONNECT_BY_ROOT C.MENU_ID AS root, CASE WHEN C.PGM_URL IS NOT NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'M' END menuUrlGubun FROM (SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.UPR_MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME, B.PGM_ID, B.PGM_URL, A.MENU_LUP, A.OT_URL, A.MENU_DIV, A.USE_YN FROM () A, PRM_MNG B WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PGM_ID = B.PGM_ID(+)) C START WITH C.UPR_MENU_ID = #{menuId1Lvl} CONNECT BY PRIOR C.MENU_ID = C.UPR_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY C.MENU_LUP

SELECT C.PGM_URL FROM ( SELECT A.MENU_DIV, A.PGM_ID, A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_LUP, A.UPR_MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME FROM () A START WITH A.UPR_MENU_ID = #{menuId} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.UPR_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.MENU_LUP) B, PRM_MNG C WHERE C.PGM_ID = B.PGM_ID AND C.PGM_URL IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT C.PGM_URL, B.MENU_ID FROM ( SELECT A.MENU_DIV, A.PGM_ID, A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_LUP, A.UPR_MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME FROM MENU_MNG A START WITH A.UPR_MENU_ID = #{menuId} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.MENU_ID = A.UPR_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.MENU_LUP) B, PRM_MNG C WHERE C.PGM_ID = B.PGM_ID AND C.PGM_URL IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1
